dt-option.name: columns.searchPanes.orderable
dt-option.summary: Hide the Ordering buttons in the pane of a specific column

type.description: By setting the `-init columns.searchPanes.orderable` option to `false` the ordering buttons will be hidden in the pane for that specific column.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init columns.searchPanes.orderable` paramater is `true`, meaning that as standard the ordering buttons will be included in the pane.
dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchPanes will be displayed with the Ordering buttons included in the interface. However if the value of `-init columns.searchPanes.orderable` is set to 'false' then the ordering buttons will no longer be displayed.
The ordering buttons can be hidden for all of the panes by making use of `-init searchPanes.orderable`.

example.title: Hide ordering buttons for the 5th columns pane
